    <facet>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Masno središče sistema</string>
            <string language="en">Center of mass of particle system</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitte der Masse des Partikelsystems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Centre de la masse du système de particules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Centro da massa do sistema da partícula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Centro di massa di sistema della particella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κέντρο της μάζας του συστήματος μορίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Centro de la masa del sistema de la partícula</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Sistem treh masnih delcev povezanih z vzmetjo in masno središče sistema pri delovanju samo notranjih sil.</string>
            <string language="en">System of three particles connected with spring and change of center of mass of such system when only internal forces apply.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">masno središče</string>
            <string language="en">center of mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">notranja sila</string>
            <string language="en">internal force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vzmet</string>
            <string language="en">spring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">templates</string>
            <string language="en">templates</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">System von drei Partikeln schloß an Frühling 
und an Änderung der Mitte der Masse solchen Systems an, wenn nur 
interne Kräfte zutreffen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Système de trois particules liées au ressort et
au changement du centre de la masse d'un tel système quand seulement 
les forces internes s'appliquent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sistema de três partículas conectou com a 
mola e a mudança do centro da massa de tal sistema quando somente as 
forças internas se aplicam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un sistema di tre particelle ha collegato con la 
molla ed il cambiamento del centro di massa di tale sistema quando 
soltanto le forze interne si applicano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σύστημα τριών μορίων σύνδεσε με την άνοιξη και την
αλλαγή του κέντρου της μάζας τέτοιου συστήματος όταν μόνο 
ισχύουν οι εσωτερικές δυνάμεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistema de tres partículas conectadas con el 
resorte y el cambio del centro de la masa de tal sistema cuando 
solamente las fuerzas internas se aplican.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitte der Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interne Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frühling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schablonen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">centre de la masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force interne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ressort</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">descripteurs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">centro da massa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força interna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">molla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mascherine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κέντρο της μάζας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εσωτερική δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άνοιξη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
